author: Special Correspondent
text:
A SEA OF DEVOTEES:Thousands of devotees throng Sri Subramaniya Swamy Temple in Tiruchendur on the occasion of Thai Poosam on Sunday.— Photo: N. Rajesh

Thousands of devotees from various parts of southern districts participated in ‘Thai Poosam’ festival at Sri Subramaniya Swamy Temple at Tiruchendur on Sunday.

The devotees, who had gathered at the coastal town for the occasion, participated in the special prayers and dharshan organised from 3.30 a.m. after taking holy dip in the sea. After special deeparadhana at noon, special abhishekam and alangaram were performed at Thai Poosa Mandapam in the evening.

Following ‘veethi ulaa’ in the night, special abhishekams were performed to the deities.

Thousands of devotees from Tirunelveli, Thoothukudi, Virudhunagar and other southern districts, who had come to Tiruchendur on ‘padayatra’, participated in the festival. Thai Poosam festival was conducted in Murugan temples in Tirunelveli district as well.
title: Thai Poosam festival held with fervour
